main event: A white streak was observed entering the atmosphere beyond Buck Island, Caribbean, as viewed from the hills above Christiansted.
interesting points: The object was observed at a 45-degree angle, approximately 10 degrees above the horizon.
The object was not a flare and lasted for about 5 seconds.
The color of the object remained white throughout the sighting.
The observation was reported to the FAA Flight Service Station in St. Croix, VI, which then forwarded the report to the Commander, Caribbean Front.
The report was part of Project 10073, which was a system for collecting and analyzing UFO sightings.
sighted object: a white streak entering the atmosphere
witnesses: observer from the hills above Christiansted
photographs: yes, the report indicates that photos were taken
